byline.original: By TONY LI and JP ROBINSON

abstract: From our exploratory work, we’ve come up with two open source plugins to share with the community: drone-gke for Google Container Engine and drone-gae for Google App Engine.
snippet: From our exploratory work, we’ve come up with two open source plugins to share with the community: drone-gke for Google Container Engine and drone-gae for Google App Engine....

headline.main: Continuous Deployment to Google Cloud Platform with Drone
